# elizaos/eliza Daily Update (Jan 7, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
Today's development focused on a critical bug fix for plugin-bootstrap and plugin-sql related to server ID changes. Several new issues were opened concerning runtime optimization, database query patterns, and message processing, while a significant number of UI/UX and agent management issues were closed.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### Plugin Stability and Compatibility
A bug fix was implemented to address issues in `plugin-bootstrap` and `plugin-sql` related to a `serverId` to `messageServerId` change, ensuring proper functionality of actions and providers. This resolves user reports of version 1.7.0 not working.
- Fixed `plugin-bootstrap` and `plugin-sql` actions/providers for `serverId` to `messageServerId` change ([#6333](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6333))

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
- A new pull request, [#6339](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6339), was opened to skip the `pgcrypto` extension for PGLite in `plugin-sql`.

## CLOSED ISSUES

### UI/UX and Agent Interaction Improvements
Several issues related to the user interface and agent interaction were closed, enhancing the overall user experience.
- Resolved issues with agent creation, including username requirements and blank name fields ([#6306](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6306), [#6307](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6307)).
- Addressed display issues such as removing agent avatars in the chat menu and ensuring agent responses start from the top ([#6308](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6308), [#6309](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6309)).
- Implemented dynamic sizing for the chat box and improved chat summaries ([#6310](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6310), [#6311](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6311)).
- Fixed scrolling issues on the page and agent sorting functionality ([#6318](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6318), [#6319](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6319)).
- Resolved the need to refresh after deleting conversations ([#6322](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6322)).

### Agent Management and Authentication
Improvements were made to agent management and authentication processes.
- Enhanced knowledge transfer for public agents ([#6303](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6303)).
- Implemented limits on messages for non-signed-up users and separated public agent states ([#6312](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6312), [#6313](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6313)).
- Adjusted free credit amounts and streamlined the wallet connection process ([#6315](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6315), [#6317](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6317)).
- Addressed agent "following" functionality and JWT authentication/user management ([#6321](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6321), [#6327](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6327)).

### Database and Extension Fixes
A specific database extension issue was resolved.
- Skipped the `pgcrypto` extension for PGLite in `plugin-sql` ([#6340](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6340)).

## NEW ISSUES

### Performance and Optimization
New issues were opened to address various performance bottlenecks and optimization opportunities within the framework.
- Optimize runtime initialization by adding missing checks, removing double lookups, and exploring parallelization for independent operations ([#6334](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6334)).
- Implement UPSERT patterns for database queries to replace check-then-insert logic and optimize entity retrieval ([#6335](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6335)).
- Investigate provider batching for `composeState` ([#6336](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6336)).
- Explore parallelization for message processing, including saving messages, getting user state, and processing attachments ([#6337](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6337)).

### Race Condition and Feature Development
A critical race condition was identified, and a new feature was proposed.
- Fix TOCTOU (Time-Of-Check-To-Time-Of-Use) race condition in credit deduction for streaming endpoints using a "deduct-before, reconcile-after" pattern ([#6338](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6338)).
- Propose an "Apps promotion feature" ([#6341](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6341)).

## ACTIVE ISSUES

### Slash Commands Functionality
Issue [#15](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/15) discusses the disappearance of "join" and "leave" slash commands. The latest comment from `odilitime` confirms that the functionality has been made extensible, allowing developers to add custom slash commands if desired. This suggests a shift towards a more modular approach for command management.

### Discord Plugin Publication Failure
Issue [#40](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/40) concerns the failure to publish Discord plugin version v1.3.4, leading to a jump to v1.3.5. `odilitime` provided a detailed update, noting that v1.3.3 is the last successfully published version on NPM. The investigation into the publishing failures on December 23rd revealed TypeScript errors related to `EventPayloadMap` and `DiscordRegisterCommandsPayload` in `src/service.ts`, indicating type incompatibility issues during the build process. The current `package.json` dependencies on `elizaos/config 1.6.5` and `elizaos/^1.7.0` are also being reviewed as part of the investigation.
